attributes.action: Stop the public from entering parliament to limit the spread of the virus
attributes.additional_details: To protect parliamentary staff from being exposed to people who may be infected with Coronavirus
attributes.background: Stop public from using parliament for school visits and third party hire events to limit the spread of the virus

rejection.details:
Since you started the petition, the requested action has been taken.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
